title: Web Development Masterclass
description: Comprehensive web development course covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks. Learn to build responsive websites from scratch.
details: This masterclass covers 50+ hours of video content including projects, quizzes, and real-world applications. You'll learn the latest web technologies and best practices used by professional developers.

title: Premium UI/UX Design Templates
description: 30 professionally designed UI/UX templates for web and mobile applications. Fully customizable Figma files included.
details: Get access to 30 ready-to-use design templates including landing pages, dashboards, mobile apps, and admin panels. All files are in Figma format for easy customization.

title: React Advanced Patterns
description: Master advanced React patterns including hooks, context API, and performance optimization techniques.
details: Learn from industry experts about advanced React patterns, state management, and building scalable applications. Includes 8 real-world projects.

title: Complete Logo Design Pack
description: 1000+ high-quality logo templates in AI, EPS, and PNG formats. Perfect for startups and small businesses.
details: Access a comprehensive collection of professional logo designs suitable for various industries. Includes editable source files in multiple formats.

title: Digital Marketing E-Book
description: The ultimate guide to digital marketing strategies, SEO, social media, and content marketing in 2025.
details: Comprehensive 500+ page e-book covering all aspects of modern digital marketing. Includes case studies, templates, and actionable strategies.

title: WordPress Development Course
description: Complete WordPress development course from basics to advanced plugin and theme creation.
details: Learn to build professional WordPress websites and plugins. Covers PHP, database management, and deployment. Includes 40+ hours of content.

title: Mobile App UI Kit
description: Professional mobile app UI kit with 200+ components and screens for iOS and Android apps.
details: Complete UI kit with buttons, cards, forms, navigation, and more. All components are fully customizable in Sketch and Figma.

title: SEO Optimization Guide
description: Step-by-step guide to ranking your website on Google and improving organic traffic.
details: Learn proven SEO techniques, keyword research, link building, and technical SEO. Includes tools, templates, and resource links.

title: Python Programming Essentials
description: Master Python programming with projects, algorithms, and best practices for beginners to intermediate developers.
details: 60+ hours of comprehensive Python content including data structures, OOP, web scraping, and more. Includes 15+ real-world projects.

title: Brand Identity Templates
description: Complete brand identity package including logo, business cards, letterheads, and social media templates.
details: Professional brand kit templates that you can customize for your business. Includes colors, fonts, guidelines, and usage examples.
